channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Gal Zaidman, Personal blog

item.title: JSON Marsheling and Unmarshaling
item.description: Most of the communication that happens over REST involves passing data as JSON.

item.title: Web Crawling In Golang With Colly
item.description: Before we start This tutorial was created while implementing a small project that required web crawling.

item.title: Writing and Running Playbooks
item.description: Playbooks are the main power of ansible. I like to think of a playbook as an easy to manage script.

item.title: Managing Hosts With Ansible
item.description: When we use ansible we often need to manage remote hosts, those hosts can be bare-metals, VMs, instances running on different clouds and so on.

item.title: Ansible the What and Why
item.description: What is Ansible Ansible is an open source automation platform which is being developed by Redhat, it has a very large community of developers from simple users to huge organization.
